channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: Best of fall
item.description: The chase is on as autumn colors coat the countryside.

item.title: Savoring the Seven Lakes Trail
item.description: A leisurely ride in western Wisconsin yields scenery, serenity and ice cream.

item.title: 30 classic fall hikes
item.description: For autumn scenery, these beautiful trails are the best of the best.

item.title: Copper Harbor refuge
item.description: Early fortune-seekers left their mark on a village at the tip of Michigan's Keweenaw Peninsula.

item.title: Trail mix in St. Croix Falls
item.description: For hikers, bicyclists and paddlers, this river town is a crossroads.

item.title: Sightseeing on the St. Croix
item.description: Thanks to glaciers, Taylors Falls is the Pothole Capital of the World.

item.title: A Minnesota snow sampler
item.description: For skiing and snowshoeing, four state parks along I-35 are as up north as you need to be.

item.title: One fall swoop
item.description: The roller-coaster hills and riverside bluffs of northeast Iowa yield a photo album of panoramas.

item.title: Excursion to Stillwater
item.description: This historic Minnesota river town is a favorite weekend getaway.

item.title: Snug on the St. Croix
item.description: In Minnesota's Wild River State Park, a guesthouse lets guests dwell in comfort amid 7,000 acres of beauty.

item.title: Sweden in Minnesota
item.description: Prowling antiques shops around Lindstrom, visitors find a beloved heritage.

item.title: Getaway on the St. Croix
item.description: An easygoing Wisconsin river town has a treat for every visitor.
